document_data.name: Glowcap Mushroom
document_data.mainbody: '''Glowcap mushrooms''' were edible luminescent [[fungi]] found in the depths of the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Description: ''Glowcap mushrooms'' were popular among people traveling through the unwelcoming deep cavers of Underdark, providing them with much needed illumination and pleasant-tasting food.
document_data.Availability:
Even though glowcaps grew only in the Underdark, they were a trade commodity. Merchants from the Underdark traded [[wine]]s and glowcap mushrooms for [[Calishite]] [[silk]]s, pitted [[date]]s, and metal-works of good quality. This trade was especially lucrative among surface expatriates from Underdark.

Glowcaps were one of the ingredient in preparing [[duergar]] [[fragrant fungus stew]] that possessed a bright flavor and was popular in the [[Western Heartlands]].
